newsitem.title: SPAIN: Endesa 9-mth gp net profit up 11.8 pct.
newsitem.headline: Endesa 9-mth gp net profit up 11.8 pct.

text.p: NOTE: Endesa said its recently-announced investment in Sevillana and Fecsa would require a maximum investment of 200 billion pesetas, which would be financed with income generated during the year as well as debt.
